descriptionHtml:
The World's No.1 Odia Matchmaking Service
With over 6 lakh success stories, OdiaShaadi.com is connecting more people for marriage than any matrimonial site! A pioneer in the matchmaking & matrimony industry, we’ve emerged as the most trusted and secure service for finding a life-partner.

The App is free to download and provides access to features that allow you to:

- Register & Create your profile
- Search by community, city or profession & find new matches everyday
- View full profiles of your matches along with their photos
- Shortlist matches you like and save favourites for future viewing
- Chat on-the-go with our Award Winning Odia Shaadi Messenger - anytime, anywhere!

And if you want to enjoy the following benefits :
- View the Phone numbers, Email IDs of the matches you’d like to connect with
- Send personalized messages and Initiate Chat
- Increase your profile’s visibility and Responses
Just upgrade to a premium membership offered at affordable prices.

Find someone from your city, be it Bhubaneswar, Cuttack, Berhampur, Bangalore or Baleshwar. Search for matches by community like Khandayat, Karana, Brahmin Panda and others.

Some accolades that we are proud of include:

- Best Matrimonial Site (Reader's Choice, New York Times publication, USA)
- Top 50 Innovative Companies (Fast Company, USA)
- Most Trusted Matrimonial Brand (Brand Equity, Economic Times, India)

OdiaShaadi.com is also one of the smallest sized apps in its category.

So download our app today and find your perfect life partner!

With over 6 lakh success stories, OdiaShaadi.com is connecting more people for marriage than any matrimonial site! A pioneer in the matchmaking & matrimony industry, we’ve emerged as the most trusted and secure service for finding a life-partner.

The App is free to download and provides access to features that allow you to:

- Video call your matches with our newly launched Shaadi Meet
- Register & Create your profile
- Search by community, city or profession & find new matches everyday
- View full profiles of your matches along with their photos
- Shortlist matches you like and save favourites for future viewing
- Chat on-the-go with our Award Winning Odia Shaadi Messenger - anytime, anywhere!

And if you want to enjoy the following benefits :
- View the Phone numbers, Email IDs of the matches you’d like to connect with
- Send personalized messages and Initiate Chat
- Increase your profile’s visibility and Responses
Just upgrade to a premium membership offered at affordable prices.

Find someone from your city, be it Bhubaneswar, Cuttack, Berhampur, Bangalore or Baleshwar. Search for matches by community like Khandayat, Karana, Brahmin Panda and others.

Some accolades that we are proud of include:

- Best Matrimonial Site (Reader's Choice, New York Times publication, USA)
- Top 50 Innovative Companies (Fast Company, USA)
- Most Trusted Matrimonial Brand (Brand Equity, Economic Times, India)

OdiaShaadi.com is also one of the smallest sized apps in its category.

So download our app today and find your perfect life partner!

For a daily dose of love and relationship titbits:
- Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/ShaadiDotCom
- Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/shaadicom
- Follow us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/shaadi.com

Visit our website - Odia Matrimony & Matrimonial Site

title: Odia Matrimony App by Shaadi.com

creator: People Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to OdiaShaadi.com - Trusted Odia Matrimony app

With millions of success stories our app has transformed the way brides & grooms meet for marriage.

We have always differentiated ourselves from other Odia Matrimony services through our innovations and consumer first approach.

This makes it simple and easy for you to search for eligible Odia brides/grooms around you and filter it by community, city & profession.

As one of the trusted apps in the Odia Matrimony category, we have touched more than 3.5 million lives.

We also provide members with an option to video call their matches with our newly introduced feature: Shaadi Meet


Why Choose Shaadi.com for Your Odia Matrimony Search?

Our customization, filtering, and blocking systems strive to build technology that will only show matches that are relevant to you.

As one of the trusted marriage & matrimony apps, we have continually redefined the boundaries with our innovation-led approach.

With an intuitive approach, our app guides you smoothly through a signup process and will have you interacting with like-minded Odia matches in no time.

We understand marriage is the most critical milestone of your life and thus we make it simple & easy for you to search for the matrimony profile of eligible brides/grooms around you.

Here are a few tips of how you can use OdiaShaadi app more effectively:

- Register & create your matrimony profile
- View full profiles of your matches along with their photos
- Connect with Odia matches which are suitable as per your preferences
- Chat on-the-go with Shaadi Messenger - anytime, anywhere!
- Contact your preferred matches via chat or call and get a step closer to finding your perfect life partner

Using our app, you can create an Odia Matrimony profile for yourself, your friends or family members.

And if you want to enjoy the following benefits:
- View the Phone numbers, Email IDs of the matrimony profiles you’d like to connect with
- Send personalized messages and Initiate Chat
- Increase your profile’s visibility and Responses
Just upgrade to a premium membership offered at affordable prices.


Search for Odia Matrimony Profiles by Location or Religion

To help you get connected with matches from your preferred locations, we have also added state and city level filtering of matches.

Using this app, you can search for Odia Matrimony profiles from your city, be it in Bhubaneswar, Cuttack, Berhampur, Bangalore or Baleshwar.

Using this app, you can also connect with Odia NRIs residing in UK, USA, Canada, Australia, Singapore etc. or search for the matrimony profile of brides/grooms by religions like Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Buddhist, etc.


Search for Profiles by Preferred Communities

To help you find a more suitable match, we also provide an option to filter profiles by different communities.

This makes it easy for you to search for Odia Matrimony profiles of matches by major communities like Khandayat, Karana, Brahmin Panda and others.


Expand your Search Using our Other Community Apps

Apart from OdiaShaadi.com, you can also use our other community apps for your Matrimony search such as MarathiShaadi, PunjabiShaadi, TeluguShaadi, TamilShaadi etc.


Taking you a Step Closer to Your Perfect Life Partner

With over 1000 new matrimony registrations a day, OdiaShaadi (sometimes misspelt as OdiaShadi), has redefined the way Odias, across the world, meet.

We are committed to ensure that every profile put up on our platform is screened to give you a smooth partner search experience.

We are one of the trusted Odia Matrimony platforms with genuine profiles of people who are really serious about marriage.

Well, that’s all we have to say.

Now, it’s time for you to download this app, create your matrimony profile and get a step closer to your perfect life-partner.

Shaadi Live is a revolutionary matchmaking service that allows members to meet up to 10 matches in 1 hour over video calls.

With millions of success stories our app has transformed the way brides & grooms meet for marriage.

We have always differentiated ourselves from other Odia Matrimony services through our innovations and consumer first approach.

This makes it simple and easy for you to search for eligible Odia brides/grooms around you and filter it by community, city & profession.

As one of the trusted apps in the Odia Matrimony category, we have touched more than 3.5 million lives.

We also provide members with an option to video call their matches with our newly introduced feature: Shaadi Meet


Why Choose Shaadi.com for Your Odia Matrimony Search?

As one of the trusted marriage & matrimony apps, we have continually redefined the boundaries with our innovation-led approach.

With an intuitive approach, our app guides you smoothly through a signup process and will have you interacting with like-minded Odia matches in no time.

We understand marriage is the most critical milestone of your life and thus we make it simple & easy for you to search for the matrimony profile of eligible brides/grooms around you.

Here are a few tips of how you can use OdiaShaadi app more effectively:

- Register & create your matrimony profile
- View full profiles of your matches along with their photos
- Connect with Odia matches which are suitable as per your preferences
- Chat on-the-go with Shaadi Messenger - anytime, anywhere!
- Contact your preferred matches via chat or call and get a step closer to finding your perfect life partner

Using our app, you can create an Odia Matrimony profile for yourself, your friends or family members.

And if you want to enjoy the following benefits:
- View the Phone numbers, Email IDs of the matrimony profiles you’d like to connect with
- Send personalized messages and Initiate Chat
- Increase your profile’s visibility and Responses
Just upgrade to a premium membership offered at affordable prices.


Search for Odia Matrimony Profiles by Location or Religion

To help you get connected with matches from your preferred locations, we have also added state and city level filtering of matches.

Using this app, you can search for Odia Matrimony profiles from your city, be it in Bhubaneswar, Cuttack, Berhampur, Bangalore or Baleshwar.

Using this app, you can also connect with Odia NRIs residing in UK, USA, Canada, Australia, Singapore etc. or search for the matrimony profile of brides/grooms by religions like Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Buddhist, etc.


Search for Profiles by Preferred Communities

To help you find a more suitable match, we also provide an option to filter profiles by different communities.

This makes it easy for you to search for Odia Matrimony profiles of matches by major communities like Khandayat, Karana, Brahmin Panda and others.


Expand your Search Using our Other Community Apps

Apart from OdiaShaadi.com, you can also use our other community apps for your Matrimony search such as MarathiShaadi, PunjabiShaadi, TeluguShaadi, TamilShaadi etc.


Taking you a Step Closer to Your Perfect Life Partner

With over 1000 new matrimony registrations a day, OdiaShaadi (sometimes misspelt as OdiaShadi), has redefined the way Odias, across the world, meet.

We are committed to ensure that every profile put up on our platform is screened to give you a smooth partner search experience.

We are one of the trusted Odia Matrimony platforms with genuine profiles of people who are really serious about marriage.

Well, that’s all we have to say.

Now, it’s time for you to download this app, create your matrimony profile and get a step closer to your perfect life-partner.

title:
OdiaShaadi, Matchmaking App
9.75.4

creator: People Interactive
descriptionHtml:
OdiaShaadi.com by Shaadi.com, the world's No.1 Matchmaking platform, pioneered online matchmaking in India and has continued to lead the exciting space for 20 years. It has been built on one simple idea: to help people find a life partner, discover love and share joy. Our vision is to build the world’s first 'togetherness' company! We are proud to say that we have helped over 8 million people in finding a life partner and touched the lives of over 60 million people globally.

Welcome to Odia Shaadi - A world beyond Odia Matrimony.

Using our app, you can search for profiles & filter them by community, city & profession.

Why Choose Our App in Your Search for an Odia Life Partner?

- Verified profiles & 100% Secure
- Lakhs of Odia-speaking members
- Trusted by Brides & Grooms in Odisha and around the world
- Chat on-the-go with Shaadi Messenger
- Speak to Astrologers

We have been in the Odia matchmaking industry for over 2 decades, and quality customer service has always been our priority.

What Makes Our App Different from Other Matrimony Apps

- Innovations & consumer-first approach
- Strict profile screening
- The most user-friendly apps in the category
- Quick response to queries
- Affordable premium plans
- Focused on providing Detailed Family Information

Here’s How to Create an Odia Shaadi Profile

- Sign up using an email ID & password
- Complete the process by entering your personal details
- Do OTP verification of your mobile number
- Upload your picture
- Update your profile info

That’s it. Your profile is ready!

Search for Odia Shaadi Profiles by Location

Look for profiles from your preferred locations using our state & city-level filtering of matches.

Find profiles from states like Odisha, West Bengal, Jharkhand, etc.

You can also look for Odia-speaking profiles from your city, be it in Bhubaneswar, Cuttack, Kolkata, Jamshedpur, etc.

You can connect with NRIs as well, who are residing in the UK, USA, Canada, etc.

Simply put, we have matches from all over the world.

Look for Odia Profiles by Communities

We know how important it is for you to choose matches from your own community.

Thus, you can try our community-level filters to get closer to your perfect life partner.

Search for profiles by major communities like Khandayat Odias, Karana Odias, Brahmin Odias, and others.

We have matches from over 80 communities.

This opens a lot more opportunities for you than the traditional matchmaking processes.

We have always differentiated ourselves from other matrimony services by creating an effective query resolution process.

This gives complete flexibility for users to choose profiles as per their liking.

Try Our Other Community Apps in Your Search for a Life Partner

Our apps cater to communities from all parts of India.

Apart from OdiaShaadi, you can also create a profile on our other community apps like KannadaShaadi, MarathiShaadi, etc.

Get Ready for a Safe and Secure Matchmaking Experience

Every profile put up on our platform is screened to give you a smooth partner search experience.

Over the years, we’ve built a strong brand presence in every household in India.

We are one of the trusted matchmaking platforms with genuine profiles of people who are serious about marriage.

So it’s time for you to download the app and create your matchmaking profile.
descriptionShort: A world beyond matrimony. 60 million members to date. 8 million success stories.
